nodes.text: Level 10 was a location in Pau City on Utapau.

The tenth of eleven levels comprising the sinkhole settlement of Pau City, Level 10 was part of the civic level, closest to the planet's surface. It featured a docking bay large enough to accommodate a core ship.

During the Clone Wars, the Confederacy of Independent Systems landed the core ship Unlimited Projection[source?] on the Level 10 docking bay, to serve as their headquarters on Utapau. It was here that Obi-Wan Kenobi engaged General Grievous in single combat. The level was soon overrun by clone troopers under Commander Cody.
